price: They used to sleep only a little at night[4],
arabic: كَانُواْ قَلِيلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَعُونَ
footnotes: [4] i.e., spending most of the night in prayer, reciting the Qur’an, and in supplication.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kānū qalīlan mina al-layli mā yahjaʿūna
